page.title: 17Recreation
page.content: Hot rice.Children stand in a circle, legs apart.A ball is dropped which rolls through someone's legs.He has to hit everyone else with the ball.If someone gets hit he has to help to get others. British Bulldog.Someone stands on a line between two points 10 metres apart.He calls the name of someone who has to cross the line.If he succeeds, untouched, everyone else is released and may run.Anyone caught must help to catch others. Nipsy or nur and spell is an adult{ {game}.An oval,wooden peg is balanced on an upturned house brick.It is struck by a long,narrow-handled stick with a paddle at the end.The peg spins into the air and is hit by the stick. The winner is the person to strike it farthest.
